Literature.Title: Odilorhabdins, Antibacterial Agents that Cause Miscoding by Binding at a New Ribosomal Site.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 51697(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae DSM 30054(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MIC=4µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 7002(MIC=16µg/ml),Serratia marcescens DSM 30121(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 1117(MIC=>64µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>64µg/ml),Stenotrophomonas maltophilia CIP 60.71(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 43816(MBC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 13439(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-2146(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 13443(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae NCTC 13442(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC BAA-2340(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC BAA-2452(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC BAA-2469(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC BAA-2468(MIC=16µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(no activity data)
